CustomField.formula: IF( IS_MAILING_HOUSE__c ,(LastName &( MailingStreet) & MID( MailingPostalCode , 0, 5)), (IF(OR(ISBLANK(MailingStreet ), ISBLANK(MailingPostalCode ), Is_Default_Address__c, Is_Default_Last_Name__c ) , null, LastName & MID( MailingStreet , 0, 9) & MID( MailingPostalCode , 0, 5))))
CustomField.label: LAZ
